Here are steps you can take which may allow you to qualify:

Setting up a Pooled Income Trust will protect what Medicaid believes to be excess income that is needed to pay the recipient’s monthly expenses. We will be there to guide the family through the process of utilizing the trust.

Ways Medicaid Helps YOU

  • Inpatient and Outpatient hospital services
  • Transportation to your Medical services
  • Nursing facility services
  • Pedicatric and family Nurse Practitioner services
  • Diagnostic & other preventative / Treatment services

What can you do to qualify for Medicaid?

  • Step 1

    Consider spending your excess funds on private homecare, any needed new households items, or even on a burial agreement which will decrease your funds enough to qualify.

  • Step 2

    There maybe a way to descrease resources by giving a part of your assets to a trusted person/ family member. However, you MUST discuss how to do this with Medicaid & Medicare Advisory Groupy.

Don’t be confused!
